channel.title: Re : no more bumping or reporting wrong layout! read this now!
channel.description: I would like to know why Melissa locked this thread. I see no point, I was having a discussion with Un-Named, I wasn't spamming. It just leaves another unanswered question, thanks Melissa. Just to make it clear btw, I had several posts on that thread and he also had some, replying to the people who needed help and answers. Now they're deleted, which was even worse than locking it.

item.title: Re : no more bumping or reporting wrong layout! read this now!

item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Thank-you, they really should unlock it.
Keep this thread alive, let me know you’re thoughts on this matter people!

Read full topic

item.title: Re : no more bumping or reporting wrong layout! read this now!
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Atleast someone agrees with me.

Locked Before it gets spammed Thanks The Un-Named

I mean, wtf? What right does she have to lock it, just because she can doesn’t mean she can do it whenever she want’s. She also deleted a thread I made a while ago arguing why the RS2 Server Advertisement Discussion thread was deleted. Why would you do that? Anyway, Un-Named left it open for a reason. For discussion, which is now unavailable. And the Moderators/Administrators wonder why there’s so much spam, people asking questions in the wrong section, because there is nowhere to ask them…

Read full topic
